2017 Schedule

Wednesday, August 16

2:00 PM - 9:00 PM Exhibits Accepted on the Fair Grounds

Thursday, August 17

9:00 AM Judging of Exhibits

6:00 PM Opening Dinner in the Dance Hall

Doors Open at 6:00pm. Turkey Dinner served at 6:30pm - Price $14.00 Under 6 FREE. Celebrity Cake Auction immediately following the dinner. Silent auction begins.

Fair Book

For 2017 we have a new Exhibitor’s Manual AKA “Fair Book”. Download the 2017 edition here or pick up a hard copy at Stanley area businesses:

  • Johnstone’s PharmaChoice
  • Hillside Convenience
  • Stanley Community Library
  • Taymouth Community Center
